flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: It's been a busy year for Venus Zine. Over the past few months, we've introduced a new look for the magazine and moved into a new office space in Chicago, complete with a roof deck. Although the space had great potential, it clearly needed a little ... something.The Deck before...A good skeleton, the wooden deck came with built-in benches, planters, and two lounge chairs. We wanted to invest in the space and make it more inviting and comfy, so we can eat lunch and take breaks up there... A Venus Zine Makeover: Roof Deck at DIY Music Magazine
guide.introduction_rendered: It's been a busy year for Venus Zine. Over the past few months, we've introduced a new look for the magazine and moved into a new office space in Chicago, complete with a roof deck. Although the space had great potential, it clearly needed a little ... something.The Deck before...A good skeleton, the wooden deck came with built-in benches, planters, and two lounge chairs. We wanted to invest in the space and make it more inviting and comfy, so we can eat lunch and take breaks up there... A Venus Zine Makeover: Roof Deck at DIY Music Magazine
guide.summary: Our Chicago roof takes on California style for less than $300.
guide.title: A Venus Zine Makeover: Roof Deck
